languages.text: "Святый Трон..." {n}Абеляр закрывает глаза и сокрушенно качает головой. Кажется, признание ксеноса состарило его еще на пяток лет.{/n}
"Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Святый Трон..." {n}Абеляр закрывает глаза и сокрушенно качает головой. Кажется, признание ксеноса состарило его еще на пяток лет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “黄金王座在上……”{n}阿贝拉德闭上眼睛，悲伤地摇着头。异形口中道出的事实，似乎让他一瞬间老了五岁。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上……”{n}阿贝拉德闭上眼睛，悲伤地摇着头。异形口中道出的事实，似乎让他一瞬间老了五岁。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Par le Trône... » {n}Abélard ferme les yeux et secoue la tête avec tristesse. Les aveux du xénos semblent l'avoir vieilli de cinq ans.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône... » {n}Abélard ferme les yeux et secoue la tête avec tristesse. Les aveux du xénos semblent l'avoir vieilli de cinq ans.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Por el bendito Trono...». {n}Abelard cierra los ojos y niega tristemente con la cabeza. Parece que la admisión de la xenos le ha hecho envejecer un lustro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por el bendito Trono...». {n}Abelard cierra los ojos y niega tristemente con la cabeza. Parece que la admisión de la xenos le ha hecho envejecer un lustro.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「なんということだ…」{n}アベラルドは目を閉じて、悲し気に首を振る。異種族の侵入を許したことで、彼はまるで5歳は年を取ったようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんということだ…」{n}アベラルドは目を閉じて、悲し気に首を振る。異種族の侵入を許したことで、彼はまるで5歳は年を取ったようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Gesegneter Thron ..." {n}Abelard schließt die Augen und schüttelt traurig den Kopf. Er scheint durch das Geständnis des Xenos um fünf Jahre gealtert zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gesegneter Thron ..." {n}Abelard schließt die Augen und schüttelt traurig den Kopf. Er scheint durch das Geständnis des Xenos um fünf Jahre gealtert zu sein.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Kutsal Taht adına." {n}Abelard, gözlerini kapatıp başını hüzünle sallıyor. Zenonun itirafı onu beş yıl yaşlandırmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Blessed Throne..." {n}Abelard closes his eyes and shakes his head in sorrow. It seems the xenos's admission has aged him five years.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal Taht adına." {n}Abelard gözlerini kapatıyor ve başını hüzünle sallıyor. Zenonun itirafı onu beş yıl yaşlandırmış gibi görünüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
